description: Try our easy to follow Curried Sausage Casserole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Curried Sausage Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, heat mashed potatoes according to packet instructions. Divide mash among plates. Top with sausages, vegetables and sauce. Serve scattered with parsley.
